medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain started yesterday morning around 7:30 AM and is described as sharp and stabbing, without radiation. It has been constant and progressively worsening throughout the day and evening, reaching a worst pain level of ___ and receding to a best level of ___. Pain is worse with movement, when sitting, and with deep inspiration.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Alcoholic cirrhosis, portal hypertension, history of esophageal varices s/p hemorrhage x3 treated by endoscopic methods, history of basilar skull fracture and intracranial hemorrhage, depression.
